entry.title: RESOLVED: GKE service is unaffected. Mitigation for issue with Anthos On-Prem admin workstation access, is underway. See further details below.
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-26 06:49 and ended at 2021-08-26 18:06 (all times are US/Pacific).

GKE service is unaffected. Mitigation for issue with Anthos On-Prem admin workstation access, is underway.

ETA for the releases:

  • Release 1.8.2 with the fix is expected to be next Monday (8/29).
  • And hotfix for 1.7.3 is expected to be next Thursday (9/02).

For workaround procedures, please refer to the previous notification down below.

If you have questions or are impacted, please open a case with the Support Team and we will work with you until this issue is resolved.

No further updates will be provided here. We thank you for your patience while we're working on resolving the issue.

Affected products: Google Kubernetes Engine

entry.title: RESOLVED: Cloud Logging experiencing issue returning results for "tail" commands globally
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-26 14:25 and ended at 2021-08-26 14:53 (all times are US/Pacific).

The issue with Cloud Logging gcloud alpha logging tail command and any direct calls to the Tailing API is believed to be affecting a very small number of projects and our Engineering Team is working on it.

If you have questions or are impacted, please open a case with the Support Team and we will work with you until this issue is resolved.

No further updates will be provided here.

We thank you for your patience while we're working on resolving the issue.

Affected products: Operations

entry.title: UPDATE: Cloud Logging experiencing issue returning results for "tail" commands globally
entry.summary:
Incident began at 2021-08-26 14:25 and ended at 2021-08-26 14:53 (all times are US/Pacific).

Summary: Cloud Logging experiencing issue returning results for "tail" commands globally

Description: We are experiencing an issue with Cloud Logging.

Customers may not be able to look at live logs by running "tail" commands

Our engineering team continues to investigate the issue.

We will provide an update by Thursday, 2021-08-26 14:55 US/Pacific with current details.

We apologize to all who are affected by the disruption.

Diagnosis: Customers may not be able to look at live logs by running "tail" commands

Workaround: Normal log queries work fine and users can still use streaming in the UI.

Affected products: Operations
